description:
Brenn Wyson sets up a little playroom in the abandoned bunker deep in the woods. He's extremely excited to have Nomad as his new "playmates". Brenn has a talent of making his hesitant guest a willing participant. He tries out new toys on Nomad, including the CB-6000 chastity device, the inflatable mouth gag and inflatable dildo. Brenn gives Nomad hard corporal and an even harder fuck in the end.

Correction: The chastity device in the update is CB-6000 not CB-600 as mentioned in the interview. There was a misprint on the storage bag.
title: Deep in The Woods
